description: New Career flow allowing users to select a team from 32 available teams across 8 divisions and start a new franchise career mode.
goal: Enable users to start a new career by selecting their team from a scrollable list of all 32 franchise teams
requirements: TeamCard component showing logo, city, name, division
Team cards have selectable state with visual feedback
Next button disabled until team selected
Team data structure with colors and division info
Navigation to career confirmation/start after selection
constraints: UI only for now - no database integration yet
